name: Minnesota Pork Chops
author: Starbuck
summary: This is a very good recipe that I got from my home state, Minnesota. Every summer when we come and visit, we are sure to buy wild rice for this casserole.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a skillet with a small amount of oil, brown the chops seasoned with salt and pepper
Spray a large 9x13 inch casserole dish with nonstick spray
Sprinkle the washed rice evenly in bottom of dish
Arrange the chops on top and spoon soup over chops and rice
Cover casserole with aluminum foil and seal tightly
Bake for 1 1/2 hours to 2 hours or until rice and chops are tender
